title: Late Night with the Devil
review: This seems to have all the stylish parts of the 70s: sets, music and outfits that still look good today. Most of the cringe parts of that decade have been erased. It's quite a lot like Ghostwatch really, and it did make me laugh.#sIt's a shame they tease a musical number and then skip it in the end. The ending itself is great though.#d
